{{ $url := "https://github.com/" }} {{ $repo := print .Site.Params.githubUser "/" .Site.Params.githubRepo }} {{ $sectiontag := print "section-" (substr (replace (index (split (lower .Page.File) "/") 0) ".md" "") 3) }} {{ $lessontag := print "module-" (substr (replace (index (split (lower .Page.File) "/") 1) ".md" "") 3) }} {{ $statustag := print "status-" .Page.Params.status }} {{ $labels := print $sectiontag "," $lessontag "," $statustag ",feedback"}} {{ $issue := print $url $repo "/issues/new?labels=" $labels "&assignees=@" .Site.Params.githubUser "&title=ADD A DESCRIPTIVE TITLE" "&body=Add a description of your problem/comments here"}} Provide feedback on this module!
